byline.contributor: Stephen Castle reported from Brighton, and Steven Erlanger from London.
byline.original: By STEPHEN CASTLE and STEVEN ERLANGER

abstract: New Labour Party leader Jeremy Corbyn, in first major speech, says he is patriot who loves his country and shares its values; Corbyn, whose roots are in party's hard left, offers few policy specifics in speech.
lead_paragraph: The new Labor leader used his keynote speech to assure voters of his patriotism and to insist that his brand of socialism chimes with British values.

headline.main: Jeremy Corbyn Talks of ‘Shared British Values’ at Labour Party Conference
headline.print_headline: New Labour Leader Offers Reassurance of His Shared British Values

snippet: The new Labor leader used his keynote speech to assure voters of his patriotism and to insist that his brand of socialism chimes with British values.
